name: .NAZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .NAZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game data file used by Total Overdose, an open world third-person shooter game that takes place in Mexico; contains various data, such as sounds, graphics, and game properties; can be used for adding support for multiple languages.

content: Using a text editor, some Total Overdose users modify game settings in the blocks.naz file to enable some cheats, such as "god mode," full ammunition, or invisibility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
